segments.text: I feel like an invisible observer in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is lost in her chore, seemingly oblivious to the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the puddle at her feet, growing ever larger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy's body stretch awkwardly, and it angers me to think of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got that cookie jar in reach, and I can’t help but feel surprised by his bravery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, hoping for a cookie as if it were a treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s an unspoken agreement between them, like a conspiratorial bond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman could just take a moment to look around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast—the serene garden looks so far removed from our chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head, knowing a fall or splash could alter everything here.
segments.speaker: PAR
